intro: Impatiens biluoxueshanensis, commonly known as the Biluoxueshan Impatiens, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Balsaminaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of red, pink, and white. The plant has heart-shaped leaves and produces capsule fruits that contain numerous small seeds. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions with cool climates. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
